title.rendered: TOP SPRING COLORS – BABY BLUE + WHITE

content.rendered:
TOP SPRING COLORS – BABY BLUE + WHITE

Spring is just around the corner and the color trends are as beautiful as ever. Tons of soft pastel colors like baby blue, mint green pastel, dusty rose, and soft pastel yellow. I’m loving a good mix between blue and white for a dreamy spring look that’s inspired by the sky and clouds.

Springtime always reminds me of a fresh start. The leaves start growing back, the chill of winter is gone, and everything is new again. I like to take some time at the beginning of every spring to practice a few moments of gratitude. It’s always nice to light a candle, write in a journal, go for a walk, and take deep breaths, remembering all of the things that I’m grateful for.

Both looks are from FWRD.COM. The earrings are from FWRD as well.  The baby blue leather bag is from Bottega Veneta, the middle bag is Acne, the white mini bag is Jacquemus, and the bottom crystal bag is Alexander Wang.

I’m still loving the slicked-back ponytail and minimal makeup look. It makes such a perfect canvas to show off statement earrings and new fashion looks. Of course, spring is the perfect time to try out some new flirty lashes, like these D’Wispies.

What do you think about blue and white together? What are you most looking forward to wearing this spring? Let us know in the comments or send us a DM on Instagram. 

XO XO, Dionne 

P.S. Did you book your lash extensions appointment yet? For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here.
